revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=UniFi Security Gateway |upc=810354020803 |asin=B00LV8YZLK |newegg=0XK-000W-00060 |est_release_date=February 2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Currently Shipping |type=Router Firewall |flags=metal case, heatsink, |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5020 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=cFeon |fla1_model=EN25QH16A-104GIP |fla2=8 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX29LV640ETTI-70G |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG8SB-25 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J1 |serial=yes,, RJ45 console,, (115200,8,N,1), |eth_chip1_brand=Atheros |eth_chip1_model=AR8035-A |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |eth_chip3_brand=Atheros |eth_chip3_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC125A;;2;,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;2;,,, 2A Schottky Barrier Rectifier;Diodes Inc;B260/A;;2;,,, 1MHz, 2.0A, Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi; uP9617;;2;,,, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.1;UBNT Build ID: 4674499-gfa58f5d |stock_os=Linux;3.10.107;EdgeOS; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |oui_eth=B4:FB:E4, }} {{TagLine|Enterprise Gateway Router with Gigabit Ethernet}} :[https://dl.ubnt.com/datasheets/unifi/UniFi_Security_Gateway_DS.pdf Datasheet] :[https://www.ui.com/downloads/guides/UniFi/UniFi_Controller_V5_UG.pdf User's Guide] :[https://dl.ui.com/unifi/firmware/UGW3/4.4.44.5213844/GPL.UGW3.v4.4.44.5213844.tbz2 GPL Firmware Source]
